charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1101_0100_:
One evening, [Name:PlayerNickname ] got lost
in the forest.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1101_0200_:
Eventually, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Erika and Leafeon
napping under a tree.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_0400_:
Good morning, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I wasn’t expecting to see you here.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_0401_0600_: Oh dear, is it dark already?
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_0402_0800_: Good...evening? Oh dear, look how dark it is.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_0900_:
It seems we’ve overslept again.
How embarrassing.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_1000_: Leafeon, you should have woken me up.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_0302_1300_: She was out like a log.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_0402_1400_: Oh, so she was sleeping, too?
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_1500_:
Sorry, Leafeon. I suppose I should have woken
you up.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_1600_:
Oh, but wait a second... If I was sleeping too,
then I wouldn’t have been able to wake you up,
would I?
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_1700_:
Hm... I wonder what we could have done to avoid
this predicament.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_1800_:
... ... ...
Oh, how rude of me. Sorry to trail off like that.
I must still be a little groggy.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_1900_:
I suppose this is why people say Leafeon and I
are too easygoing.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_0401_2100_:
Yes, but I suppose they’re right. We’ve been
together since she was an Eevee, you know.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_0402_2300_:
Yes, we do! I imagine it’s because we’ve been
together since she was just an Eevee.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_2400_:
Perhaps we’ve always had a similar personality...
Either that, or she’s taken after me quite a bit.
It’s hard to tell.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_2500_:
Eevee and Leafeon are rare to find in the Kanto
region to begin with, so we don’t have much to
compare ourselves with.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_2600_:
I hear that another Eevee can be found in Celadon
City, though. I wonder where it could be?
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_2700_:
Oh, my. Perhaps Leafeon is ready for some
exercise now after all that rest.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_2800_:
Why don’t we have a battle,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_2900_: I would love to have a battle now, too.
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_3000_:
It may be because I feel so well rested
after taking a nap...
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_3100_:
but it’s also fun to battle in this sygna suit. It’s
both cute and functional!
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_0402_3500_: Wonderful! You’re so full of energy!
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_3600_: Let’s get ready to break a sweat, Leafeon!
charaepi_ch0008_10_erika/2301_1201_3700_:
That way, we’ll be able to sleep well again
later tonight!
